original_title: People’s Bank ‘Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw picks 4 millionaires
original_body_lines: People’s Bank’s ‘People’s Remittance Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw to select the millionaire winners for January, February, March and April took place at the People’s Bank, Overseas Customer Services premises at Colombo 10 recently.
In addition to that, the weekly winners for the period from 1 January to 13 May were also drawn at the event, and will be gifted Rs. 100,000 each.

Senior Deputy General Manager (Overseas Customer Services) Rohan Pathirage, Deputy General Manager (Channel Management) T.M.W Chandrakumara, Deputy General Manager (Recoveries) Ganga Senanayaka, Assistant General Manager (OCS) Aruni Liyanagunawardana, Assistant General Manager (Audit) Shantha Gangabadage, Senior Manager (OCS) Thilini Perera, Senior Manager (IT) Vipula Warnakula, and Department of Inland Revenue Senior Tax Officer (Western Province) J.P Gunathilake participated in the event.

People’s Bank launched ‘Vaasi Kotiyai 2023’ draw to encourage and appreciate Sri Lankan migrant workers who work tirelessly to strengthen the country’s economy and build a better life for themselves and their families.
